com.google.gwt.gwtai.applet.linker
Class JarLinker

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.core.ext.Linker
      com.google.gwt.core.ext.linker.AbstractLinker
          com.google.gwt.gwtai.applet.linker.JarLinker

@LinkerOrder(value=POST)
public class JarLinker
extends com.google.gwt.core.ext.linker.AbstractLinker

A GWT linker to create and sign a JAR file which contains all the Applet classes. The advantage of using a linker over Ant is that the linker runs within the compiler context, meaning the same properties and environment variables are available.

Use an add-linker tag to trigger this linker:
<add-linker name="jarlinker" />

The following configuration properties can be used to configure the linker's behavior:

  • jarlinker.name
  • jarlinker.include
  • jarlinker.jarsigner
  • jarlinker.keystore
  • jarlinker.alias
  • jarlinker.storepass

Author:
Adrian Buerki
